verses.verse: <S%H4100>"What<s%> a <S%H5826>help<s%> you are to the <S%H3808>weak<s%><S%H3581>!<s%> How you have <S%H3467>saved<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5797>strength!<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> you have <S%H3289>given<s%> to [one] <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom!<s%> What <S%H8454>helpful<s%> <S%H8454>insight<s%> you have <S%H7230>abundantly<s%> <S%H3045>provided!<s%>
"He <S%H9503>wraps<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in His <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> does not <S%H1234>burst<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> them.
"He <S%H270>obscures<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3677>full<s%> <S%H3677>moon,<s%> And <S%H6576>spreads<s%> His <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it.
"He has <S%H2328>inscribed<s%> a <S%H2328>circle<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> At the <S%H8503>boundary<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
"He <S%H9541>quieted<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with His <S%H3581>power,<s%> And by His <S%H8394>understanding<s%> He <S%H4272>shattered<s%> <S%H7293>Rahab.<s%>
"By His <S%H7307>breath<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H8235>cleared;<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H9135>pierced<s%> the <S%H1281>fleeing<s%> <S%H5175>serpent.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7098>fringes<s%> of His <S%H1870>ways;<s%> And <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H8102>faint<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> we <S%H8085>hear<s%> of Him! But His <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H7482>thunder,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H995>understand<s%>?"
